law.catch_line: Except as specifically provided in this title, this title does not limit the right of:...
law.text:
Except as specifically provided in this title, this title does not limit the right of:
An individual to practice a health occupation that the individual is authorized to practice under this article;
A chiropractor to practice physical therapy if the chiropractor is authorized to practice physical therapy under Title 3 of this article;
An individual to provide nonmedical services while:
Practicing cosmetology; or
Operating a health club; or
A health club to advertise as a health club.
